title: Video: BOOTS – Dust
body:
Seemingly appearing out of nowhere with songwriting and production credits on Beyonce’s latest album, **BOOTS’** rise to fame was sudden and meteoric.

Having shed some of the mystery surrounding his identity, the New York based musician has dropped his latest track, _Dust_, alongside a video directed by and staring Cara Stricker. Lustful and daring in equal measures, it’s a further indication as to just why he’s one of the most highly sought after composers in the world right now.
